Class GeoHelper

See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * Helper class for writing a GeographyLayer's data to the external * storage, and reading and interpreting such stored files into one. Also * handles uploading of a layer's data to its corresponding server layer. * *
    Version:
    0.54, 2013-08-01 * *
    Author:
    Mattias Spångmyr *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean mExternalStorageAvailable
      Whether or not the external storage is available.
      private BroadcastReceiver mExternalStorageReceiver
      System class used to keep track of external storage states, e.g.
      private boolean mExternalStorageWriteable
      Whether or not it is possible to write to the external storage.
      private boolean mFileConflict
      Whether or not a file conflict has occurred; a file with the same name as that being saved already exists.
      private GeographyLayer mGeoLayer
      The active GeographyLayer from which to upload data.
      private HttpClient mHttpClient
      The HttpClient to use for uploading the data.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> mInsertedIDs
      The new ID:s on the server of the features uploaded.
      private java.lang.String mNamespace
      The XML namespace to use, the same as the name of the workspace on the geospatial server.
      private java.lang.Long mRowId
      The id of the layer to activate in the local SQLite database in case of running the "read" mode.
      private int mRwMode
      The mode to run, being either of "read", "write" or "overwrite".
      private BackboneSvc mService
      A reference to the application's background Service, received in the constructor.
      private boolean mSuccess
      Whether or not the helper has succeeded with the requested operation.
      static int RWMODE_OVERWRITE
      Constant identifying the run mode "overwrite" (to external storage).
      static int RWMODE_READ
      Constant identifying the run mode "read" (from external storage).
      static int RWMODE_UPLOAD
      Constant identifying the run mode "upload" (to server).
      static int RWMODE_WRITE
      Constant identifying the run mode "write" (to external storage, without overwriting).
      private static java.lang.String SRS
      Constant defining what spatial reference system (srs) to use for sending geometry to the geospatial server.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this ASyncTask.
      private static int TIME_OUT
      Constant defining the wait time (seconds) before an upload operation times out.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeoHelper(BackboneSvc service, int rwMode)
      Basic constructor setting up the upload/write mode and the BackboneSvc reference.
      GeoHelper(BackboneSvc service, int rwMode, long rowId)
      Read mode constructor setting up the read mode, the id of the layer to activate and the BackboneSvc reference.

      Pauses or resumes this AsyncTask if the external storage becomes unavailable or is available again.

      Parses an XML response from a WFS Transaction (Insert) request and reports if the response contains a Service Exception.
      private boolean readIntoGeographyLayer()
      Reads the geometry and attribute data from the local storage into the active GeographyLayer.
      private void startWatchingExternalStorage()
      Start to listen for changes in the storage state, and report any changes to handleStorageChange.
      private void stopWatchingExternalStorage()
      Stop listening for external storage state changes.
      private void updateExternalStorageState()
      Checks the state of the external storage to determine what interactions can be performed.
      private boolean upload()
      Uploads the active layer's data to the geospatial server and deletes the data from the device.

      Write the geography of the layer to files on the external storage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoHelper

        public GeoHelper(BackboneSvc service,
         int rwMode)
        Basic constructor setting up the upload/write mode and the BackboneSvc reference.
        Parameters:
        service - The database manager that issued the request and through which the UI thread can be reached.
        rwMode - The mode to run, being either of "read", "write" or "overwrite".

      • GeoHelper

        public GeoHelper(BackboneSvc service,
         int rwMode,
         long rowId)
        Read mode constructor setting up the read mode, the id of the layer to activate and the BackboneSvc reference.
        Parameters:
        service - The database manager that issued the request and through which the UI thread can be reached.
        rwMode - The mode to run, being either of "read", "write" or "overwrite".
        rowId - The id of the layer to activate in the local SQL database.

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected GeoHelper doInBackground(GeographyLayer... layers)

      • onProgressUpdate

        protected void onProgressUpdate(java.lang.Void... values)

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(GeoHelper result)

      • readIntoGeographyLayer

        private boolean readIntoGeographyLayer()
        Reads the geometry and attribute data from the local storage into the active GeographyLayer.

      • writeFromGeographyLayer

        private boolean writeFromGeographyLayer(boolean overwrite)
        Write the geography of the layer to files on the external storage.
        Parameters:
        overwrite - Determines whether or not to overwrite existing data. If false and there are already stored data on this layer, the method will have no effect.
        Returns:
        True if successful.

      • deleteGeographyLayer

        public static void deleteGeographyLayer(java.lang.String layerName)
        Removes the Layer's data from the external storage.
        Parameters:
        layerName - The name of the layer to delete.

      • isStored

        public static boolean isStored(java.lang.String layerName)
        Checks if the layer with the specified name is stored on the external storage.
        Returns:
        True of the layer is stored on the device.

      • upload

        private boolean upload()
        Uploads the active layer's data to the geospatial server and deletes the data from the device.
        Returns:
        True if successful.

      • startWatchingExternalStorage

        private void startWatchingExternalStorage()
        Start to listen for changes in the storage state, and report any changes to handleStorageChange.

      • stopWatchingExternalStorage

        private void stopWatchingExternalStorage()
        Stop listening for external storage state changes.

      • updateExternalStorageState

        private void updateExternalStorageState()
        Checks the state of the external storage to determine what interactions can be performed.

      • handleStorageChange

        private void handleStorageChange()
        Pauses or resumes this AsyncTask if the external storage becomes unavailable or is available again.

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get method for path to the geometry on the external storage. The path does not include layer namespace.
        Returns:
        The layer path.

      • formGeomString

        private java.lang.String formGeomString()
        Forms a single string containing all the point geometry objects in the GeographyLayer.
        Returns:
        A string with the point geometry id and WKT on each row.

      • formSequenceGeomString

        private java.lang.String formSequenceGeomString()
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Forms a single string containing all the line or polygon geometry objects in the GeographyLayer.
        Returns:
        A string with the line or polygon id and WKT on each row.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • formUnusedPointString

        private java.lang.String formUnusedPointString()
        Forms a single string containing all the point geometry objects in the GeographyLayer that are not included in a point sequence.
        Returns:
        A string with unused points represented by their id and WKT on each row.

      • formAttString

        private java.lang.String formAttString()
        Forms a single string containing all the attributes of the objects in the GeographyLayer.
        Returns:
        A string with the geometry id and attributes on each row, separated by semi-colons.

      • formTransactXML

        private java.lang.String formTransactXML()
        Forms a single string containing an XML of a WFS Transaction Insert request.
        Returns:
        A string with the WFS-T Insert XML.

      • formInsertElements

        private java.lang.String formInsertElements()
        Forms a single string containing the Insert XML elements of a WFS Transaction Insert request.
        Returns:
        A string with the Insert elements of a WFS-T Insert XML.

      • parseXMLResponse

        protected boolean parseXMLResponse(java.io.InputStream xmlResponse)
        Parses an XML response from a WFS Transaction (Insert) request and reports if the response contains a Service Exception.
        Parameters:
        xmlResponse - String containing the XML response from a DescribeFeatureType request.
